Text: So I'm a bit confused...this issue and last...is that 5th dimesional imp referencing events that happened to THIS new 52 superman..or is he alluding to the old universe?
Does it matter? This title AND Morrison are pretty terrible.
does anyone have justice league of america 2 and not the 2nd issue of vibe

In all honesty Grant's run started off very good in the beginning, I really liked it then it just started to get way too confusing. Stuff just stopped making sense chronologically, I would literally have to re-read the issue immediately just to know what the hell just happened not to mention Morales art at times just wasn't that good. All in all I wouldn't say it was a terrible read but it certainly wasn't a "groundbreaking" story It was just kinda ok to me and I may come back and read it later down the road.
